Interface ProductService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductServiceImpl
public interface ProductService
ProductService is an interface that defines methods for managing products. These methods include creating, retrieving, updating products, and querying products based on various criteria.

The methods in this interface throw BadRequestException and NotFoundException when the input is invalid or when the requested product data is not found.

  • Method Details

    • createProduct

      ProductDTO createProduct(ProductDTO productDTO) throws BadRequestException
      Creates a new product based on the provided product data.
      Parameters:
      productDTO - the ProductDTO containing the data for the new product.
      Returns:
      the created ProductDTO with the product details.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the provided product data is invalid.

    • getProductById

      ProductDTO getProductById(Long productId) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves a product by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the ProductDTO representing the product with the given ID.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no product is found with the given ID.
      BadRequestException - if the provided ID is invalid.

    • getAllProducts

      List<ProductDTO> getAllProducts() throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves a list of all products.
      Returns:
      a list of ProductDTO representing all products.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no products are found.
      BadRequestException - if an error occurs while retrieving products.

    • getAllProductsFromCafeteriaId

      List<ProductDTO> getAllProductsFromCafeteriaId(Long id) throws NotFoundException, DataMappingException
      Retrieves a list of all products from a specific cafeteria by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      a list of ProductDTO representing the products from the given cafeteria.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no products are found for the given cafeteria.
      DataMappingException - if an error occurs during data mapping.

    • getAllProductsFromOrderId

      List<ProductDTO> getAllProductsFromOrderId(Long id) throws NotFoundException, DataMappingException
      Retrieves a list of all products associated with a specific order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the order.
      Returns:
      a list of ProductDTO representing the products from the given order.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no products are found for the given order.
      DataMappingException - if an error occurs during data mapping.

    • updateProduct

      ProductDTO updateProduct(Long productId, ProductDTO updatedProduct) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Updates an existing product with new data.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product to update.
      updatedProduct - the ProductDTO containing the updated product data.
      Returns:
      the updated ProductDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no product is found with the given ID.
      BadRequestException - if the updated product data is invalid.
